p: Serological typing/subtyping of isolated influenza virus strains and studying their antigenic features were carried out in the HI test by using postinfectious ferret reference sera [ 12]. The ferret reference sera to the A/Michigan/45/2015 A(H1N1)pdm09, A/HongKong/4801/2014 A(H3N2), B/Brisbane/60/2008 (Victoria lineage), B/Phuket/3073/2013 (Yamagata lineage) influenza viruses were used for serological typing of influenza virus isolates. All reference sera were kindly furnished by the WHO Collaborating Center on Influenza in Atlanta, US.
